startling white leaf underside, teeth curved towards apex
Sorbus hibernica,teeth symmetrical (not curved towards apex). Shorter fruit; leave underside not as white.
Silvery white as they unfold in sprint, the leaves gradually turn green on top as they loose their hairs; the underside maintains this colour and densly hairy.
